data.name: HODL Token
data.description:
## What Is HODL Token (HODL)?

HODL is a decentralized ERC20 Community-Driven Token on the Ethereum Chain designed to provide holders with Static Rewards. The token runs on a proprietary method that taxes each transaction on Buys/Sells and returns a 20% dividend Paid in $HODL to its holders, which aims to offer scalability, as well as assisting HODL in its growth.
The team has already purchased and burned over $500,000 USD against the supply, automatically giving the token's real world value pegged in Ethereum.

HODL relies on the following principles: 
- 20% Dividend Paid in $HODL: Up to 20% of every buy/sell is redistributed to the $HODL holders. Min 1 million tokens required.
- Powerful Supply Control Feature: This token started with a 40% burn + $500,000 USD bought back and also burned. There is over 90.5% of supply in a black hole wallet. Every transaction will send an amount of coins equal to the ‘reward’ tokens gained by the burn wallet to the black hole.


## How Many HODL Tokens Are There in Circulation?

HODL launched on Uniswap V2 on June 23, 2021 with 1 Quadrillion HODL tokens created at genesis. 20% of transaction fees on each trade are paid out to the holders. 90% have been burned since launch.

### Where Can I Buy HODL (HODL)?

HODL is available for trading on Uniswap V2, with HODL and ETH pairs currently available.

To buy you need to go to Uniswap V2 and paste the contract address of HODL, or click on the following link: https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?outputCurrency=0xe2a083397521968eb05585932750634bed4b7d56&use=V2
